comment: Value of supremum of set of subsets of Hilbert space. For an alternate version of the value, see ~ hsupval2 . (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
